alert.note: Alert for Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 7:29PM EDT until July 12 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN AROOSTOOK COUNTY... At 729 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 29 miles northeast of Lille to Cross Lake, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Fort Kent, Madawaska, Van Buren, Eagle Lake, Frenchville, New Canada, Lille, Cross Lake, Wallagrass, Grand Isle, Sinclair, Daigle, Guerette, Soldier Pond and Saint Agatha. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
